title: Who Are the Lawyers Arguing Affirmative Action Before the Supreme Court?
description: A look at the lawyers who are arguing in case.
dc:creator: Stephanie Saul
media:credit: Kayana Szymczak for The New York Times
media:description: Wasserstein Hall, which is part of Harvard Law School. The case being argued before the Supreme Court on Monday could fundamentally reshape college admissions.
